level.heading: Tampering and misuse.
level.text: No person shall break, alter, damage, tamper with, or otherwise interfere with or impair the wastewater system.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-76
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-76, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-105.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-95
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-95, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-105.01.
